profile_photo.name: LIAO Shiwu
profile_photo.position: Ph.D. student, School of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Huazhong University of Science and Technology

profile_about.title: About
profile_about.paragraph_1: My name is LIAO Shiwu. I am a Ph.D. student and a research assistant at Huazhong University of Science and Technology, Wuhan, China. My research focuses on the renewable energy integration, enviromental related power system operation, and power system restoration.
profile_about.paragraph_2: I'm an active and enthusiastic person, learning new things fast, full of new ideas, and also good at working my ideas out. I love the energy area and have always wanted to change the way people use energy. My power system background pushed me to a conclusion that improving the demand side efficiency and shifting to renewable energies are the best two ways to help the world, and that is just what I'm working on.

profile_quote.title: Favorite quote
profile_quote.quote: " To the time to life, rather than to life in time. "
profile_quote.author: Blaise Pascal
